Class CUDADenseLinearAlgebraProvider<E>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.backends.CUDADenseLinearAlgebraProvider<E>

public class CUDADenseLinearAlgebraProvider<E> extends Object implements LinearAlgebraProvider<E>

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable()
      Description copied from interface: ComputeBackend
      Checks if this backend is currently available.

      For example, a GPU backend might return false if no GPU is detected.

      Specified by:
      isAvailable in interface ComputeBackend
      Returns:
      true if backend can be used, false otherwise

    • createContext

      public ExecutionContext createContext()
      Description copied from interface: ComputeBackend
      Creates an execution context for running operations.

      The context should be used within a try-with-resources block to ensure proper cleanup of resources.

      Specified by:
      createContext in interface ComputeBackend
      Returns:
      new execution context

    • getPriority

      public int getPriority()
      Description copied from interface: ComputeBackend
      Returns the priority of this backend for automatic selection. Higher values indicate higher priority.

      Default priorities:

      • CPU: 0 (fallback)
      • GPU: 10
      • Quantum: 5 (specialized use cases)

      Specified by:
      getPriority in interface ComputeBackend
      Returns:
      priority value
